  ssriv(s0, cn, crp)
  nnrp(cv(s0))
  divrcnv(s0, c0)
  rlimclim(cmpt(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0))), nat0, cn, nat1, wcel(c0, cc))

  1zzd(wcel(c0, cc))
  fmpttd(s0, cn, co(c0, cdiv, cv(s0)), cc, wcel(c0, cc))

thm divcnvshft(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0[~~>]0)
  ⊣ c1 =(ℤ≥ ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1)→(c0 ` s0)=(c3[÷](s0[+]c4)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {

  divcnv(hs0, c3)
  bitri((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))[~~>]0, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))[~~>]0, ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))|`(ℤ≥ ` 1))[~~>]0)
  breq1i((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c3[÷]hs0)), cli, nat0, ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))|`(ℤ≥ ` 1)))
  eqtr3i((hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c3[÷]hs0)), ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))|`(ℤ≥ ` 1)), ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))|` ℕ))
  ax-mp(((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))|` ℕ)=(hs0 ∈ ℕ ↦(c3[÷]hs0)), ℕ ⊆ ℤ)
  nnssz()
  resmpt(hs0, cn, cz, (c3[÷]hs0))
  reseq2i((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0)), cn, (ℤ≥ ` 1))
  nnuz()
  mp2an((((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))|`(ℤ≥ ` 1))[~~>]0 ↔(hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))[~~>]0), 1 ∈ ℤ, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))∈ 𝕌)
  1z()
  climres(nat1, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0)), universe, nat0)
  climshft2(s0, c0, nat0, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0)), c1, c2, c4, c5, universe, w0)
  a1i(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))∈ 𝕌)
  mptex(hs0, cz, (c3[÷]hs0))
  zex()
  eqtr4d(((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))`(s0[+]c4)), (c0 ` s0), (c3[÷](s0[+]c4)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1), ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ↦(c3[÷]hs0))`(s0[+]c4))=(c3[÷](s0[+]c4)), (s0[+]c4)∈ ℤ)
  zaddcld(s0, c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c1))
  adantl(w0, s0 ∈ c1, s0 ∈ ℤ)
  sseli(s0, c1, cz)

blocks.name: harmonic
blocks.content: The harmonic series ` H ` diverges. This fact follows from the stronger ~ emcl , which establishes that the harmonic series grows as ` log n + gamma + ` _o_(1), but this uses a more elementary method, attributed to Nicole Oresme (1323-1382). This is Metamath 100 proof #34. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jul-2014.)
